trustees.name: Rahul Amulya Pradhan
trustees.caption: MBKS makes me passionate about making a change in society with the selfless intent of helping the needy. It has given me the biggest platform, purpose and meaning. Thus MBKS has become my life.

trustees.name: Akhil Ratna Chettri
trustees.caption: I've seen MBKS grow from a small cleaning campaign to what it is today and I have myself grown with it. It taught me life skills and made me realise what it is to serve others selflessly and the happiness it bring to oneself.

trustees.name: Laxmi Chettri
trustees.caption: The thing that attracted me most towards the trust was the service it rendered to the society. Working for education and healthcare for the deprived children to better their lives is what I cherish the most.

trustees.name: Samden Dukpa
trustees.caption: The two most important things that I believe MBKS has given me are a conscious mind that is aware of societal problems and takes action to solve them, and leadership skills that have helped me socially and professionally.

trustees.name: Rishi Tamang
trustees.caption: I've been associated with MBKS since 2019. Joining MBKS has been a life changing decision form as it has given me a different and a better vision towards life and helped me to become a better human being.
